item.title: Activists say Gaza flotilla circled by Israeli warship
item.description: The Global Sumud Flotilla accused an Israeli vessel of steering "dangerously close" to one of its boats.

item.title: Danish PM calls for strong answer from EU leaders to Russia's hybrid attacks
item.description: Copenhagen is on alert as EU leaders discuss boosting their defences in response to disruption from drones and Russian war planes.

item.title: Jobs, travel, national parks - what impact will US shutdown have?
item.description: Washington's political gridlock could inflict wide-ranging miseries, as anything deemed non-essential will be put on hold.

item.title: 'It's safe now': See students pulled from rubble of collapsed school
item.description: Dramatic rescue footage shows the boys in Indonesia pulled to safety after their school collapsed.

item.title: Sudanese city under siege: 'My son's whole body is full of shrapnel'
item.description: Civilians pay the price as paramilitary fighters intensify their offensive to take full control of el-Fasher.
